title: Synchronize geth for the first time and report an error 'peer connected on snap without compatible eth support' and 'Invalid parameters' and Could not compute head from new attestations
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.12.1`
Go version: `1.20.4`
OS & Version: Linux Centos7.9

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
````
WARN [07-31|00:09:32.099] Served engine_newPayloadV2               conn=127.0.0.1:49342 reqid=2 duration=2.091702ms err="Invalid parameters"                     errdata="{Error:non-nil withdrawals pre-shanghai}"
INFO [07-31|00:09:38.653] Looking for peers                        peercount=4 tried=34 static=0
WARN [07-31|00:09:45.678] Served engine_newPayloadV2               conn=127.0.0.1:49342 reqid=2 duration=2.062174ms err="Invalid parameters"                     errdata="{Error:non-nil withdrawals pre-shanghai}"

WARN [07-31|00:10:39.323] Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!

WARN [07-31|00:15:48.516] Served engine_newPayloadV2               conn=127.0.0.1:49342 reqid=2 duration=4.23464ms  err="Invalid parameters"                     errdata="{Error:non-nil withdrawals pre-shanghai}"

````
#### start command

````
geth --http --http.api eth,net,engine,admin --authrpc.jwtsecret /root/prysm/jwt.hex --datadir='/home/www/eth_data' --ws --syncmode full --http.addr '0.0.0.0' --http.vhosts '*'


./prysm.sh beacon-chain --slasher --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --prater --jwt-secret=/root/prysm/jwt.hex --checkpoint-sync-url=https://beaconstate.ethstaker.cc --genesis-beacon-api-url=https://beaconstate.ethstaker.cc

````
